title: Monster (SpliceHack)
data:
- *For other uses, see [monster (disambiguation)](/wiki/Monster_\(disambiguation\) "Monster (disambiguation)").*

This page lists all the monsters found in [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack").[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) Some of these monsters might vary from their representations in vanilla NetHack or in other variants.

Note that most of the information presented here can be obtained about any creature in SpliceHack by using the [far look](/wiki/Far_look "Far look") command. The information displayed by this command is considered the single source of truth about monsters.

Monster (SpliceHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
For other uses, see monster (disambiguation).

This page lists all the monsters found in SpliceHack.[1] Some of these monsters might vary from their representations in vanilla NetHack or in other variants.

Note that most of the information presented here can be obtained about any creature in SpliceHack by using the far look command. The information displayed by this command is considered the single source of truth about monsters.
